definition: used in transliteration
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
(literary) black/dark/many/multitude
Li ethnic group of Hainan Province/surname Li/abbr. for Lebanon 黎巴嫩[Li2 ba1 nen4]

sentences.english: I remember when she first came to Hong Kong, my teacher was still alive.
sentences.chinese: 記得佢第一次嚟香港時，我嘅老師還健喺。

sentences.english: Your husband called and said you can buy anything you want.
sentences.chinese: 你老公打電話嚟話，你想買乜都得。

sentences.english: You call me later how come out walk ?
Q27. Do you think your company will have redundancy or wage reduction plan in the coming 6 months?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲你嘅公司系嚟緊呢半年，會唔會裁員或者減薪？

sentences.english: If you have enough gingers put your horse to me.
sentences.chinese: 假如你夠姜既話就放馬過嚟。

sentences.english: If you haudio-videoe enough ginger: put your horse to me.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你夠姜既話就放馬過嚟。

sentences.english: Please do remember that i always miss you .
sentences.chinese: 我會一直等妳嚟搵我嘎。

sentences.english: If you have enough ginger, put your horse to me.
sentences.chinese: 如果你夠姜既話就放馬過嚟。

sentences.english: If you have enough ginger, put your horse to me .
sentences.chinese: 如果你夠姜嘅話就放馬過嚟。

sentences.english: I forgot to bring the Xerox of my passport.
sentences.chinese: 我唔記得咗帶我本護照嘅複印件嚟。

definition: he (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 他[ta1]
so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
possessive particle (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 的[de5]
some/few/a little (Cantonese)
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
to look for (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 找[zhao3]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
correct/suitable/to suit sb/just now (Cantonese)
to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
to confer on/to give to
thing/matter (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
home/family (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 家[jia1]
that (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 那[na4]
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
